channel.title: New Delhi on
channel.description: Recent content in New Delhi on

item.title: Twittering Away With Delhi Bloggers
item.description: If you are twittering kinds, doesn’t matter online or offline If you blog or are interested in all things blog and blogging If you live in Delhi, have lived there, have been there, or just connect with Delhi somehow else If you want to meet up with your fellow twitterers and bloggers Then you’ve got to be a part of the your very own City of The People With Hearts, Delhi.
